scripts.deploy: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.local.js --network localhost
scripts.db:deploy:local: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/db.local.js --network localhost
scripts.update:local: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/update.local.js --network localhost
scripts.build:local: cp src/frontend/contractsData/localhost/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=localhost npm run parcel:build
scripts.start: npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=localhost parcel src/index.html --open
scripts.deploy:mumbai: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.mumbai.js --network mumbai_testnet
scripts.update:mumbai: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/update.mumbai.js --network mumbai_testnet
scripts.build:mumbai: cp src/frontend/contractsData/mumbai_testnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=testnet.mumbai npm run parcel:build
scripts.deploy:polygon: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/deploy.polygon.js --network polygon_mainnet
scripts.update:polygon: env $(cat .env) npx hardhat run src/backend/scripts/update.polygon.js --network polygon_mainnet
scripts.build:polygon: cp src/frontend/contractsData/polygon_mainnet/* src/frontend/contractsData/ && npm run cleanup && NODE_ENV=mainnet.polygon npm run parcel:build
